alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 21 at 3:59PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches above 9,000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches below 9,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be confined to the northern half of the zone through Saturday morning. Southwest winds, with gusts near 60 mph, and dry conditions will be possible over South Pass Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
